name: Schmandel Royale
description:
Schmandel is a very intelligent cat and he loves cardboard boxes very much. One day when he was about to rest in his favorite box, he was suddenly attacked by some rats. No he needs to defend his box with the power of his tarotcards. 

He can either attack with magic, a sword or defend himself with the cards. The Rats seem to have an endless number so Schmandel needs to think very carefully what he does. 

Sadly the rats have the power of the tarotcards too, they split the cards and now they use them against Schmandel. If the rats hit him more than three times its over for him.  

Now he needs your help to fight of these rats and pick the right card so he can keep his cardboard box. 

Good Luck on your journey!

Made for the HTK Game Jam 2021 ICE

Leon Tokykori
